body.name: Air Fryer – 2.3-Quart Electric Fryer for Healthier Cooking – Compact Appliance with Nonstick Interior – Kitchen Gadgets by Classic Cuisine (Black)
body.stockDetail: Only 7 left in stock (more on the way).
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 1 hr 27 mins
features: MINI AIR FRYER - This compact air fryer features a 2.3-quart capacity that is designed to save vital countertop and cabinet space. It is a great addition to your kitchen accessories, perfect for dorm rooms, apartments, RVs, and homes with small kitchens.

HEALTHIER COOKING - Unlike a deep fryer, the electronic air fryer uses air to cook your food and requires little to no oil, allowing for healthier cooking. The fryer helps to reduce the amount of added fat in your daily cooking.

VERSATILE - This small air fryer has a temperature range from 180 to 400-degrees Fahrenheit, allowing you to cook at whatever temperature you need for a crispy, fried crust on anything from chicken to pastries to vegetables.

EASY TO CLEAN - The 2-quart air fryer is equipped with a pull-out basket with a nonstick interior for easy cooking. The mini fryer basket is also dishwasher safe for a simple and fast cleanup after meals.
PRODUCT DETAILS - Materials: PP Exterior and Nonstick Interior. Dimensions: (L) 10.2” x (W) 8.26” x (H) 11”. Capacity: 2.3-Quarts. BPA Free. Color: Black.
body.description: Cook all your favorite foods with little to no oil for healthier cooking with the Mini Airfryer by Classic Cuisine. This 2-qt air fryer has a temperature range from 180 to 400-degrees Fahrenheit, allowing you to cook at whatever temperature you need for a crispy, fried crust on anything from chicken to pastries to vegetables. The air frier features a nonstick interior that is easy to clean and dishwasher safe for your convenience. This convenient and compact air fry is a great addition to your kitchen appliances, perfect for dorm rooms, apartments, and homes with small kitchens. IMPORTANT: Classic Cuisine is committed to providing the consumer with the absolute best price and value on all of our products. NOTE: This is an exclusive product of Classic Cuisine and ONLY Apartment Essentials for First Apartment by Classic Cuisine are GUARANTEED to be genuine. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Classic Cuisine Mini Electric Air Fryer, 2.3-Quart Cook all your favorite foods with little to no oil with the 2.3-Quart Air Fryer by Classic Cuisine. This small air fryer has a temperature range from 180 to 400-degrees Fahrenheit, allowing you to cook at whatever temperature you need for a crispy, fried crust. The removable basket features a nonstick interior that is easy to clean, and it is dishwasher safe for your convenience. This mini air fry is a great addition to any home chef's cooking equipment, and the compact footprint makes it perfect for smaller kitchens where counter space is at a premium.

Healthier Cooking is Easy with this Mini Air Fryer This small-but-mighty countertop air fryer uses hot air to cook your food and requires little to no added oil, allowing you to reduce the amount of added fat in your daily cooking—with delicious results. Use it to quickly prepare crispy appetizers, main courses, and even mouthwatering vegetables the whole family will enjoy. PRODUCT DETAILS 2.3-Quart Capacity Nonstick Interior Dishwasher-Safe Basket Built-In Timer

Nonstick Interior The air fryer is equipped with a pull-out basket with a nonstick interior that makes clean-up a breeze and allows you to use less oil without fear of food sticking. Built-In Timer Making delicious meals, snacks, and appetizers is a snap with this easy-to-use air fryer, which features simple dials to set the temperature and control the cooking time down to the minute. Versatile Cooking This small air fryer has a temperature range from 180 to 400-degrees Fahrenheit, allowing you to cook at whatever temperature you need to achieve a crispy crust. Compact Size This mini air fryer features a compact design with a small footprint that won't take up too much space on your countertop. It's perfect for smaller kitchens, couples, and solo chefs.

2.3-Quart Capacity This countertop air fryer is perfect for preparing one to two servings of your favorite foods. Uses Less Oil Achieve crispy results with less added fat, for healthier meals with the fried crunch you crave. 180-400F Temp Range The wide temperature range allows you the flexibility to prepare any type of food. Dishwasher-Safe Basket The removable fryer basket is dishwasher safe for a simple and fast cleanup after meals.
